FuncDef:
The value-added-service daa modify-synchronous qos-profile command enables the QoS profile attribute to take effect when DAA services are dynamically modified.
The undo value-added-service daa modify-synchronous qos-profile command disables the QoS profile attribute from taking effect when DAA services are dynamically modified.
By default, the QoS profile attribute is disabled from taking effect when DAA services are dynamically modified.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To use a CoA packet to change both the DAA service bandwidth and basic user bandwidth, run the value-added-service daa modify-synchronous qos-profile command to enable both the DAA template and QoS profile attributes to take effect.
Prerequisites
An AAA domain has been configured.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
